Class StringTrimmerConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.conversion.StringTrimmerConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Converter<java.lang.String>

    public class StringTrimmerConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Converter<java.lang.String>
    A converter that trims strings and remove all html/xml markup tags
    Author:
    luis
